message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to offer it to you for $800000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value and rarity.
I'm really interested in the product, but $800000 is a bit above my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $600000. I believe that's a fair price considering the value you've described.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your concerns about the price, but I'm afraid $600000 is still a bit below the value of the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $700000. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the product's uniqueness and rarity.
